welcome_promo_text: Plan, organize and collaborate on any project with powerful projects management that can be customized to suit your needs. Mana Projects is a handy web application that will make even the most complex project magically simple.
welcome_creation_text: This application was created by a small group of developers as part of The Rolling Scopes School's React course. RSSchool is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013. Everyone can study at RSSchool, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence.

welcome_team.name: Ilona Makhnach
welcome_team.role: Application design development, creation of Welcome page, Profile page, Not found page, preloader. Localization, form validation and error handling (toasts).

welcome_team.name: Dmitriy Zamulin
welcome_team.role: Creation of Main page, Project page, components Create modal, Delete modal. Implementation of drag-and-drop, functionality of tasks. Setting up a Redux environment (RTK Query). Application deployment.

welcome_team.name: Andrei Matsiash
welcome_team.role: Creation of Sign In and Sign Up page, header, footer components. Setting up application routing, error handling (toasts). Setting up a Redux environment (RTK Query).
